mapper.select: /* getSchedTargetMappingHistListForLast */ select stmh.stmh_id, stmh.sc_id, stmh.tg_id, stmh.type, stmh.tcnt, stmh.regdate, stmh.stat, stmh.rt_code, stmh.rt_msg , stc.content, stmh.summary , st.tcnt , ct.title from sched_trigger st inner join sched_target_mapping stm on st.sc_id = stm.sc_id left outer join sched_target_mapping_hist stmh on stmh.sc_id = stm.sc_id left outer join sched_target_content stc on stc.sc_id = stmh.sc_id and stc.tg_id = stmh.tg_id and stc.stmh_id = stmh.stmh_id left outer join conf_target ct on ct.tg_id = stm.tg_id where stm.sc_id = #{sc_id} order by stmh.regdate DESC
